about_the_game:
This game is an idle game where you go through different levels of civilization to unlock new upgrades and features to help you advance to the next level.

The main objective is to reach the final level without a meteor destroying your civilization.

Meteors will rain down often, but in return we will offer you resources to improve and grow your civilization even more.

Collecting wandering souls, sending your hero on an expedition, doing research and improving the powers of your god are some of the functions
that will allow you to improve your civilization despite the incessant extinctions.
